à¤¯à¤¹à¤¾à¤ à¤µà¤¿à¤­à¤¿à¤¨à¥à¤¨ à¤­à¤¾à¤·à¤¾à¤à¤ à¤¬à¥‹à¤²à¥€ à¤œà¤¾à¤¤à¥€ à¤¹à¥ˆà¤‚ à¤”à¤° à¤…à¤¨à¥‡à¤• à¤¤à¥à¤¯à¥‹à¤¹à¤¾à¤° à¤®à¤¨à¤¾à¤ à¤œà¤¾à¤¤à¥‡ à¤¹à¥ˆà¤‚à¥¤ à¤­à¤¾à¤°à¤¤à¥€à¤¯ à¤…à¤°à¥à¤¥à¤µà¥à¤¯à¤µà¤¸à¥à¤¥à¤¾ à¤¤à¥‡à¤œà¤¼à¥€ à¤¸à¥‡ à¤¬à¤¢à¤¼ à¤°à¤¹à¥€ à¤¹à¥ˆà¥¤"""</span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># à¤Ÿà¥‡à¤•à¥à¤¸à¥à¤Ÿ à¤•à¥‹ à¤Ÿà¥‹à¤•à¤¨à¤¾à¤‡à¤œà¤¼ à¤•à¤°à¤¨à¤¾ (à¤µà¤¾à¤•à¥à¤¯à¥‹à¤‚ à¤®à¥‡à¤‚ à¤¬à¤¾à¤‚à¤Ÿà¤¨à¤¾)</span></span><span>
sentences = sent_tokenize(text)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># à¤µà¤°à¥à¤¡ à¤«à¥à¤°à¥€à¤•à¥à¤µà¥‡à¤‚à¤¸à¥€ à¤¨à¤¿à¤•à¤¾à¤²à¤¨à¤¾</span></span><span>
word_frequencies = {}

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_tokenize(text):

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stop_words:

            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> heapq

app = Flask(__name__)

</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@app.route(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-string">"/"</span></span></span></span><span>, methods=[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"GET"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">index</span></span><span>():

        word_frequencies = {}

            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> nltk.corpus.stopwords.words(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"english"</span></span><span>):
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies:
                    word_frequencies[word] = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
                    word_frequencies[word] += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>

        max_frequency = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">max</span></span><span>(word_frequencies.values())
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies.keys():
            word_frequencies[word] = (word_frequencies[word] / max_frequency)

        sentence_scores = {}
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> sent </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentences:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> nltk.word_tokenize(sent.lower()):
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies.keys():
                    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> sent </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentence_scores:

                    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
                        sentence_scores[sent] += word_frequencies[word]

        summary_sentences = heapq.nlargest(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>, sentence_scores, key=sentence_scores.get)
        summary = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>.join(summary_sentences)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:

class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> nltk
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> heapq
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> re
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> flask </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Flask, request, render_template
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> nltk.tokenize </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> sent_tokenize, word_tokenize
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> nltk.corpus </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> stopwords

nltk.download(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"punkt"</span></span><span>)
nltk.download(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"stopwords"</span></span><span>)

app = Flask(__name__)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># à¤Ÿà¥‡à¤•à¥à¤¸à¥à¤Ÿ à¤¸à¤®à¤°à¥€à¤•à¤°à¤£ à¤«à¤¼à¤‚à¤•à¥à¤¶à¤¨</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">summarize_text</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">text, num_sentences=<span class="hljs-number">2</span></span></span><span>):
    sentences = sent_tokenize(text)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># à¤µà¤¾à¤•à¥à¤¯à¥‹à¤‚ à¤®à¥‡à¤‚ à¤µà¤¿à¤­à¤¾à¤œà¤¿à¤¤ à¤•à¤°à¤¨à¤¾</span></span><span>

    word_frequencies = {}
    stop_words = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">set</span></span><span>(stopwords.words(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"english"</span></span><span>))  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># à¤¸à¥à¤Ÿà¥‰à¤ªà¤µà¤°à¥à¤¡à¥à¤¸ à¤²à¥‹à¤¡ à¤•à¤°à¤¨à¤¾</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_tokenize(text.lower()):
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stop_words:
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies:
                word_frequencies[word] = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
                word_frequencies[word] += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>

    max_frequency = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">max</span></span><span>(word_frequencies.values())

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies.keys():
        word_frequencies[word] = (word_frequencies[word] / max_frequency)

    sentence_scores = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> sent </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentences:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_tokenize(sent.lower()):
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies.keys():
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> sent </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentence_scores:
                    sentence_scores[sent] = word_frequencies[word]
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
                    sentence_scores[sent] += word_frequencies[word]

    summary_sentences = heapq.nlargest(num_sentences, sentence_scores, key=sentence_scores.get)
    summary = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>.join(summary_sentences)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> summary

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># à¤¹à¥‹à¤® à¤ªà¥‡à¤œ à¤¬à¤¨à¤¾à¤¨à¤¾</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@app.route(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-string">"/"</span></span></span></span><span>, methods=[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"GET"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">index</span></span><span>():
    summary = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> request.method == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>:
        user_input = request.form[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"user_text"</span></span><span>]
        summary = summarize_text(user_input)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> render_template(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"index.html"</span></span><span>, summary=summary)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    app.run(debug=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)

from flask import Flask, request, render_template
from nltk.tokenize import sent_tokenize, word_tokenize
from nltk.corpus import stopwords

nltk.download("punkt")
nltk.download("stopwords")

app = Flask(__name__)

# à¤Ÿà¥‡à¤•à¥à¤¸à¥à¤Ÿ à¤¸à¤®à¤°à¥€à¤•à¤°à¤£ à¤«à¤¼à¤‚à¤•à¥à¤¶à¤¨
def summarize_text(text, num_sentences=2):
    sentences = sent_tokenize(text)  # à¤µà¤¾à¤•à¥à¤¯à¥‹à¤‚ à¤®à¥‡à¤‚ à¤µà¤¿à¤­à¤¾à¤œà¤¿à¤¤ à¤•à¤°à¤¨à¤¾

    word_frequencies = {}
    stop_words = set(stopwords.words("english"))  # à¤¸à¥à¤Ÿà¥‰à¤ªà¤µà¤°à¥à¤¡à¥à¤¸ à¤²à¥‹à¤¡ à¤•à¤°à¤¨à¤¾

    for word in word_tokenize(text.lower()):
        if word not in stop_words:
            if word not in word_frequencies:
                word_frequencies[word] = 1
            else:
                word_frequencies[word] += 1

    max_frequency = max(word_frequencies.values())

    for word in word_frequencies.keys():
        word_frequencies[word] = (word_frequencies[word] / max_frequency)

    sentence_scores = {}
    for sent in sentences:
        for word in word_tokenize(sent.lower()):
            if word in word_frequencies.keys():
                if sent not in sentence_scores:
                    sentence_scores[sent] = word_frequencies[word]
                else:
                    sentence_scores[sent] += word_frequencies[word]

    summary_sentences = heapq.nlargest(num_sentences, sentence_scores, key=sentence_scores.get)
    summary = " ".join(summary_sentences)

    return summary

# à¤¹à¥‹à¤® à¤ªà¥‡à¤œ à¤¬à¤¨à¤¾à¤¨à¤¾
@app.route("/", methods=["GET", "POST"])
def index():
    summary = ""
    if request.method == "POST":
        user_input = request.form["user_text"]
        summary = summarize_text(user_input)

    return render_template("index.html", summary=summary)

if __name__ == "__main__":

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> heapq

nltk.download(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"punkt"</span></span><span>)
nltk.download(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"stopwords"</span></span><span>)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">summarize_text</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">text, num_sentences=<span class="hljs-number">3</span></span></span><span>):
    sentences = nltk.sent_tokenize(text)
    word_frequencies = {}
    stopwords = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">set</span></span><span>(nltk.corpus.stopwords.words(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"english"</span></span><span>))

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> nltk.word_tokenize(text.lower()):
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stopwords:
            word_frequencies[word] = word_frequencies.get(word, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>) + </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>

    max_freq = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">max</span></span><span>(word_frequencies.values())
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies.keys():
        word_frequencies[word] /= max_freq

    sentence_scores = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> sentence </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentences:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> nltk.word_tokenize(sentence.lower()):
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies:
                sentence_scores[sentence] = sentence_scores.get(sentence, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>) + word_frequencies[word]

    summary_sentences = heapq.nlargest(num_sentences, sentence_scores, key=sentence_scores.get)
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>.join(summary_sentences)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Function to summarize text dynamically</span></span><span>

    sentences = sent_tokenize(text)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Splitting into sentences</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(sentences) &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># If text is too short, return as it is</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> text

    sentence_scores = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> sent </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentences:

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> summary

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> re
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> flask </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Flask, request, render_template

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Function to generate a better summary</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">summarize_text</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">text</span></span><span>):

    sentences = sent_tokenize(text)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Split text into sentences</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(sentences) &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># If too short, return original text</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> text  

    stop_words = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">set</span></span><span>(stopwords.words(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"english"</span></span><span>))  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Load stopwords</span></span><span>
    word_frequencies = {}

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Tokenizing and calculating word frequencies</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_tokenize(text.lower()):
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word.isalnum() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stop_words:
            word_frequencies[word] = word_frequencies.get(word, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>) + </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>

    max_frequency = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">max</span></span><span>(word_frequencies.values(), default=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Normalize word frequencies</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies:
        word_frequencies[word] /= max_frequency  

    sentence_scores = {}

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Score sentences based on word frequencies</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> sent </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentences:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_tokenize(sent.lower()):

    num_sentences = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">max</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(sentences) // </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>)  

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Select top-ranked sentences for summary</span></span><span>
    summary_sentences = heapq.nlargest(num_sentences, sentence_scores, key=sentence_scores.get)
    summary = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>.join(summary_sentences)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> summary

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Flask web interface</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@app.route(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-string">"/"</span></span></span></span><span>, methods=[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"GET"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">index</span></span><span>():

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> request.method == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>:

nltk.download(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"stopwords"</span></span><span>)

app = Flask(__name__)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">summarize_text</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">text</span></span><span>):
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> text.strip():
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"No text provided for summarization."</span></span><span>

    sentences = sent_tokenize(text)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Splitting text into sentences</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(sentences) &lt; </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>:  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># If too short, return original text</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> text  

    stop_words = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">set</span></span><span>(stopwords.words(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"english"</span></span><span>))  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Load stopwords</span></span><span>
    word_frequencies = {}

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Tokenizing and calculating word frequencies</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_tokenize(text.lower()):
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word.isalnum() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stop_words:
            word_frequencies[word] = word_frequencies.get(word, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>) + </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>

    max_frequency = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">max</span></span><span>(word_frequencies.values(), default=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Normalize word frequencies</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies:
        word_frequencies[word] /= max_frequency  

    sentence_scores = {}

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Score sentences based on word importance</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> sent </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentences:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_tokenize(sent.lower()):
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies:
                sentence_scores[sent] = sentence_scores.get(sent, </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>) + word_frequencies[word]

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Dynamically determine the number of sentences to include in summary (40-50% of input text)</span></span><span>
    num_sentences = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">max</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(sentences) // </span><span><span class="hljs-number">2</span></span><span>)  

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Select the most relevant sentences for summary</span></span><span>
    summary_sentences = heapq.nlargest(num_sentences, sentence_scores, key=sentence_scores.get)
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Sort sentences based on their order in the original text</span></span><span>
    summary_sentences = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">sorted</span></span><span>(summary_sentences, key=sentences.index)

    summary = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>.join(summary_sentences)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Generate final summary</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> summary

</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@app.route(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-string">"/"</span></span></span></span><span>, methods=[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"GET"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">index</span></span><span>():
    summary = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> request.method == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>:
        user_input = request.form[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"user_text"</span></span><span>]
        summary = summarize_text(user_input)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> re
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> flask </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Flask, request, render_template
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> nltk.tokenize </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> sent_tokenize, word_tokenize
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> nltk.corpus </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> stopwords

nltk.download(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"punkt"</span></span><span>)
nltk.download(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"stopwords"</span></span><span>)

app = Flask(__name__)

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># à¤Ÿà¥‡à¤•à¥à¤¸à¥à¤Ÿ à¤¸à¤®à¤°à¥€à¤•à¤°à¤£ à¤«à¤¼à¤‚à¤•à¥à¤¶à¤¨</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">summarize_text</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">text, num_sentences=<span class="hljs-number">3</span></span></span><span>):
    sentences = sent_tokenize(text)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># à¤µà¤¾à¤•à¥à¤¯à¥‹à¤‚ à¤®à¥‡à¤‚ à¤µà¤¿à¤­à¤¾à¤œà¤¿à¤¤ à¤•à¤°à¤¨à¤¾</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(sentences) &lt;= num_sentences:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> text  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># If text is too short, return original text</span></span><span>

    word_frequencies = {}
    stop_words = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">set</span></span><span>(stopwords.words(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"english"</span></span><span>))  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># à¤¸à¥à¤Ÿà¥‰à¤ªà¤µà¤°à¥à¤¡à¥à¤¸ à¤²à¥‹à¤¡ à¤•à¤°à¤¨à¤¾</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_tokenize(text.lower()):
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stop_words </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">and</span></span><span> word.isalnum():
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies:
                word_frequencies[word] = </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
                word_frequencies[word] += </span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>

    max_frequency = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">max</span></span><span>(word_frequencies.values(), default=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">1</span></span><span>)

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies.keys():
        word_frequencies[word] = (word_frequencies[word] / max_frequency)

    sentence_scores = {}
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> sent </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentences:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_tokenize(sent.lower()):
            </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> word_frequencies.keys():
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> sent </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentence_scores:
                    sentence_scores[sent] = word_frequencies[word]
                </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span>:
                    sentence_scores[sent] += word_frequencies[word]

    summary_sentences = heapq.nlargest(num_sentences, sentence_scores, key=sentence_scores.get)
    summary_sentences = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">sorted</span></span><span>(summary_sentences, key=sentences.index)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Maintain original order</span></span><span>

    summary = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>.join(summary_sentences)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Join selected sentences</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> summary

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># à¤¹à¥‹à¤® à¤ªà¥‡à¤œ à¤¬à¤¨à¤¾à¤¨à¤¾</span></span><span>
</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@app.route(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-string">"/"</span></span></span></span><span>, methods=[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"GET"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">index</span></span><span>():
    summary = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> request.method == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>:
        user_input = request.form[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"user_text"</span></span><span>]
        summary = summarize_text(user_input)
        </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Generated Summary:"</span></span><span>, summary)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Debugging to check full summary</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> render_template(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"index.html"</span></span><span>, summary=summary)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    app.run(debug=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">summarize_text</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">text, num_sentences=<span class="hljs-number">2</span></span></span><span>):

class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Flask, request, render_template
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> nltk
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> nltk.tokenize </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> sent_tokenize
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> nltk.corpus </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> stopwords
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span></span><span> collections </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span></span><span> Counter

</span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Download required NLTK resources</span></span><span>
nltk.download(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"punkt"</span></span><span>)
nltk.download(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"stopwords"</span></span><span>)

app = Flask(__name__)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">summarize_text</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params">text, num_sentences=<span class="hljs-number">3</span></span></span><span>):
    <span class="hljs-string">"""
    Summarizes the input text by extracting key sentences.
    """</span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> text </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">or</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">len</span></span><span>(text.split()) &lt; num_sentences:
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> text  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Return original text if it's too short</span></span><span>

    sentences = sent_tokenize(text)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Split text into sentences</span></span><span>
    words = [word.lower() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> text.split() </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word.isalnum()]
    
    stop_words = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">set</span></span><span>(stopwords.words(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"english"</span></span><span>))
    words = [word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> words </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">not</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> stop_words]
    
    word_freq = Counter(words)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Count word frequencies</span></span><span>
    sentence_scores = {sentence: </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">sum</span></span><span>(word_freq.get(word.lower(), </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> word </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentence.split()) </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span></span><span> sentence </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">in</span></span><span> sentences}

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Select the top-ranked sentences</span></span><span>
    summarized_sentences = </span><span><span class="hljs-built_in">sorted</span></span><span>(sentence_scores, key=sentence_scores.get, reverse=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)[:num_sentences]
    
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-string">" "</span></span><span>.join(summarized_sentences)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Join sentences to form summary</span></span><span>

</span><span><span class="hljs-meta">@app.route(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-string">"/"</span></span></span></span><span>, methods=[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"GET"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>])
</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">index</span></span><span>():
    summary = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">""</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> request.method == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span>:
        user_input = request.form[</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"user_text"</span></span><span>]
        summary = summarize_text(user_input, num_sentences=</span><span><span class="hljs-number">3</span></span><span>)  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment"># Adjusted for better summarization</span></span><span>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">return</span></span><span> render_template(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"index.html"</span></span><span>, summary=summary)

</span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> __name__ == </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"__main__"</span></span><span>:
    app.run(debug=</span><span><span class="hljs-literal">True</span></span><span>)
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
